snippet.title: FoxPaww Transformations update | Trailer | PC Windows & Linux | Available on Steam and Itch.io
snippet.description:
You're a fox in this cute, funny, nature-themed brick-breaker game with a twist! Explore, discover and rescue its animal friends in 21 colorful, non-linear levels with an auto-map. Bounce or rotate your ball. Destroy or avoid cute obstacles. Levels are uniquely generated and highly replayable. Awoo!

This "transformations" update adds various power-ups for the ball and paw, depending on the rescued animal.

https://snowysierra.itch.io/foxpaww

Available for PC Windows & Linux on Steam and Itch.io
